newsitem.title: USA: U.S. debt futures end mixed after calm late trade.
newsitem.headline: U.S. debt futures end mixed after calm late trade.

text.p: June 4 - U.S. debt futures ended calm afternoon trade mixed, little-changed. Technicals skewed to upside, but range-trade seen before Friday's May jobs data. Sept T-bonds hit ceiling at 110-05/32 resistance, floor at 200-day moving average near 109-22/32 - 23/32. In morning, strong April factory orders, hedge sales from Brazil Brady swap, pressured Sept bonds.
